phrases: Although it is already May, the wind at night still feels very cold.
This is no different from my home town in the mountains.
I had thought that Tokyo was a warmer place.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
Well, this may still be Tokyo, but we are way out in the suburbs.
Or rather, do not you think the weather's gone nuts?
One day it is hot like summer and then another day it gets cold enough
to convince you we have gone back to winter.
Is the weather going to get even crazier?
I am getting worried.
I am a lot more worried about you,
Shin, the way you are headed on a direct path to destruction!
Why?
Oh, the phone.
Hello.
Oh, Mayumi?
Mhm, no problem.
Where are you now?
Roppongi?
I am out in the suburbs right now.
Then do you mind if I got on a taxi?
Really?!
All right!
Yeah.
I will be on my way now.
I am sorry but something came up so I will be going now.
Okay.
Be careful.
- Although... - Shin.
You are free to choose whatever life you wish to live,
but do not you do anything that will give the band a bad name!
Nana!
Shin's only fifteen, so you could be kinder to him
than push him away from you like that.
What would you do if he goes astray and joins some biker gang?
Hey, Shin.
I do not know why you left home,
but I am sure you were going through some very difficult times
to make that decision, right?
Did your stepmother tease you?
- Stepmother? - It is all right!
You do not hafta talk if it is painful.
But, Shin, please understand one thing.
If you underestimate women, you will get hurt in the end.
Okay.
I will be careful.
Oh boy.
Not!
You have not fixed anything.
Besides, how is giving some advice going to help him?
Advice?
You are wrong.
I was giving him a warning.
I am going home.
I have to start work in the morning tomorrow.
Nana!
Do not be so unfriendly and stay with me.
How do you expect me to spend the time alone here?
Are you serious about waiting here until Shoji gets off work?
It is easily another hour, at least.
But...
There is no need to wait.
He did say he would drop by our place later.
But still!
Jun-chan told me I should show him that I care for him.
Whatever.
Then let us go wait for him inside.
No!
Since he said not to wait for him,
openly waiting for him in full view would only have the opposite effect.
Then like I said, let us go home.
If he thinks I went home only to find that I had been waiting for him,
do not you think that would touch his heart?
That is just silly.
You have no clue how a young girl in love feels, Nana!
I do not understand!
I hate cunning women like that.
If you just say you are waiting for Shoji because you love him, then sure,
I have no problem staying here with you.
Well of course, that is the first and foremost reason...
Then all that other stuff is unnecessary.
Just wag your tail and wait.
I hate cunning women like that.
Nana!
It is okay!
You will catch a cold.
I am not that weak.
Besides, I do not feel cold.
No way.
It is really cold today.
Compared to the cold weather I experienced in my hometown,
Tokyo is like a tropical island.
The place I lived is covered in snow half of the year.
So that is what your hometown's like.
I would like to go there sometime.
The place where you grew up.
Thanks.
It is warm.
Yeah.
You know how Shoji said he had something he needed to talk to me about?
He had such a serious look.
It got me thinking.
So I would probably be unsettled and restless if we went home.
Sorry for having you stick around.
I could not say anything else.
I just continued listening to the tune Nana was quietly humming.
Nana's eyes were so clear.
She seemed to fit in better with snowy mountains,
than in this city where you can barely see the stars.
The truth is I am a very cunning woman.
I was no longer the pure woman who would continue waiting for Shoji,
while expecting nothing in return.
But I pretended to be.
Because I did not want Nana to dislike me.
Good night!
I am going on ahead!
Sachiko...
You know, I...
I am going to break up with her.
Hey!
They are finally finished.
Someone is coming out.
Really?
Sachiko!
What?
This girl...
I am sorry!
Sachiko?
Of all the names...
What are you doing?
What is with this woman?
She is my girlfriend.
Huh?!
You telling me that you have two girlfriends?
You sure have it good!
This cannot be.
This cannot be happening.
I need to talk to you about something.
There is got to be some sorta mistake.
I am sorry!
There is no way Shoji would do something like this.
Do not!
Sachiko!
It is okay, stay back!
Do not be violent with Shoji!
Shut up!
I will not be satisfied until I beat him up!
Stop it!
Stay out of this!
This has nothing to do with you!
You are the one who has nothing to do with this!
She is right.
If you want to hit someone, then hit me!
H-Hey!
I was the one who had a crush on him!
I knew he had a girlfriend, and still I could not stop myself!
I will not hide or run away so hit me to your heart's content!
You sure have guts.
Cut it out.
Hachiko!
Why are you just standing there?!
This is your fight!
You do something!
If you do not fight, you have accepted defeat!
He is your man, is not he?
Fight to get him back!
I do not want him.
I do not even want to see his face.
I was not mature enough to forgive his betrayal.
And I had too much pride to cling onto someone who just hurt me.
I lose.
The next day, like a sick person, I spent all day not being able to get outta bed.
I tried not to think about anything.
I wanted to put my mind on something else to distract me,
but I did not feel like doing anything.
I repeatedly dreamt about Shoji.
Coming.
Who is it?
Ren?!
What a surprise.
It was a dream.
What is it with me,
dreaming of celebrities at times like this when I am supposed to be heartbroken?
But why Ren?
Could this have had something to do with it?
But I would rather dream of Takumi...
It really is the doorbell!
Is it Takumi?
Or could it be Naoki?
Maybe Reira?
Yes, coming!
Thank goodness!
You are alive!
Oh.
It is only you Jun-chan.
Come on!
How many times must I ring the doorbell?
You had me worried that you slit your wrists or something.
Give me a break.
My wrists?
I see.
So you heard about last night.
Slitting my wrists...
That may be better than jumping off a bridge.
Oh, Nana must have called you.
Huh?
She is working today so she is worried about leaving me here alone all day.
No.
Your roommate is not the type to think of doing such a thing.
Huh?
Shoji called me a short while ago.
He is worried about you.
The hell with him.
If he cannot come himself I do not want him worrying about me!
You are right.
Sorry, it was stupid of me to tell you.
But you know, Nana, this is hard on Shoji too.
You know very well the type of guy he is.
Are you taking his side, Jun-chan?!
No, this is not about taking sides.
He was cheating on me all along!
It was not the whole time!
And do not say that he cheated on you.
There you go again!
You are taking his side!
Maybe I am.
To me, Shoji is a good friend just as important as you, Nana.
I cannot always be taking your side about everything.
Honestly, I have a problem with
your tendency to be quick to play the victim.
It is true.
Shoji is at fault
for going after another woman before clearing things with you first.
But before we focus on that,
you have got to acknowledge you are also to blame for this, Nana.
I know that.
But I did the best I could, Jun-chan.
I even found a job, so that I could make it on my own.
But that is something you did for your own sake.
From long ago, you would always think about just yourself.
You showed very little care for Shoji.
Love is all about a relationship two people build for each other.
If you cannot care for your partner, the relationship is not going to work out.
I am back.
You could at least turn on the light.
I know you are depressed, but come on.
You must be hungry.
I am sorry.
I did not prepare dinner tonight.
I expected as much, so I bought us some dinner on the way home.
Let us eat.
Are these tears of joy?
I have always thought this.
You always put yourself first,
but at the same time you are so caring to others.
Caring?
And what is this about me putting myself first?
On the other hand, look at me!
I did nothing but think about myself!
It never occurred to me that you would be coming home with an empty stomach!
You do not need to worry about that.
But friendship is about a relationship two people build for each other.
Why are you suddenly bringing up the obvious?
Let me at least make you some tea.
By the way, there is a letter for you from Natsuko.
Mom sent me a letter?
Bottom line, Natsuko has a knack for sensing these things.
The way she contacts you without fail when you are in a bind.
Because she is your mother.
Natsuko Komatsu
Because she is your mother.
Natsuko Komatsu
If she asks me to come home now, I would be tempted to accept.
This registered letter came for you.
Would you at least give them notice of your change of address?
Is that all?
Where are my words of consolation?
What is the matter, Hachiko?!
Are you all right?!
This will not do!
Scissors.
Where did I put them?
Never mind.
A paper-knife will do.
A paper-knife!
Do not do it!
Shoji's not the only man in the world!
I know that!
But more importantly, the tickets arrived!
- Huh? - Tickets to the Trapnest concert.
I bought two tickets.
Want To go?
Nana.
No matter how unbearable life may seem,
good things will happen as long as we are alive.
They are front row seats.
Gates Open 5:30 pm Performance 6:30 pm Reserved seating 5,250 yen (tax included) Floor 1, Central Aisle, Row 1, Seat 27
They are front row seats.
Gates Open 5:30 pm Performance 6:30 pm Reserved seating 5,250 yen (tax included) Floor 1, Central Aisle, Row 1, Seat 27
Now that I think back, during those days
it was as if luck had eluded me on a daily basis.
I never had much luck with the lottery either.
Those tickets were something God had set aside for Nana.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
